name: Name

patientDiseasesDescription: Description of your main complaint / complaints
pastIllnessesVaccinationDevelopmentHisto: About your past illnesses, vaccination details and the developmental history. It also includes details on medical history of family members. Please take time to answer this part, preferably taking the help of your family members:
patientLikesDislike: Personal history that covers all your allergies and addictions, likes, dislikes, etc
patientMentalEmotionalState: About your mental state and your emotional nature. Please write in this part about your situation in life and about all the things that are bothering you. Be totally frank and open
patientChild: Deals with the factors that affect your health. Please think carefully about each of the factors mentioned and write what specific effects they have on you
PatientRuleFollow: Rules that are appointend by doctor have to follow by patient
